definition: to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: They claimed that the boy strangled her before moving her body outside.
sentences.chinese: 他们称男孩勒死了她然后将尸体拖出去。

sentences.english: Who would have thought Xu hands energetically will actually strangled his mother alive.
sentences.chinese: 谁知，徐某竟手上使劲将母亲活活勒死了。

sentences.english: A preliminary coroner's report indicated Fiore was strangled.
sentences.chinese: 初步验尸报告显示，菲奥雷被勒死。

sentences.english: You are to abstain from food sacrificed to idols, from blood, from the meat of strangled animals and from sexual immorality.
sentences.chinese: 就是禁戒祭偶像的物，和血，并勒死的牲畜，和奸淫。

sentences.english: “It might not be strangling, ” my father says.
sentences.chinese: “也可能不被人勒死的，”我爸爸说。

sentences.english: They throttled the watchman and robbed the bank.
sentences.chinese: 他们勒死了看守人，抢劫了银行。

sentences.english: A 3-year-old you can easily strangle or overdose.
sentences.chinese: 3岁的孩子可以轻易地被勒死或毒死。

sentences.english: The kidnapper strangled the child with a piece of string.
sentences.chinese: 绑票的人用一根绳子把这孩子勒死了。

sentences.english: In at least one case, it tried to strangle its owner.
sentences.chinese: 在至少一例病患中，那只手试图勒死主人。

sentences.english: Nancy:I keep fantasizing about strangling him with his own guts.
sentences.chinese: 我不断想像用他自己的肠子把他勒死。

sentences.english: Doctor Lu owes me twenty taels so he lured me here and tried to strangle me.
sentences.chinese: 有个赛卢医少我二十两银子，赚我到郊外勒死我。

sentences.english: One morning she woke up and strangled her sleeping boyfriend to death.
sentences.chinese: 一天早上，她醒来后将还在熟睡中的男友勒死。
这个凶手勒死了被害者。

sentences.english: At the end of twelve years he had to be strangled.
sentences.chinese: 十二年后只能把他勒死了。

sentences.english: THE CAPPADOCIAN: Yet it is a terrible thing to strangle a king.
sentences.chinese: 不过，勒死一个国王确实是一件可怕的事情。

sentences.english: 29You are to abstain from food sacrificed to idols, from blood, from the meat of strangled animals and from sexual immorality.
sentences.chinese: 就是禁戒祭偶像的物，和血，并勒死的牲畜，和奸淫。

definition: to hang (i.e. execute by hanging)/to strangle
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
to hack to death/to kill with an ax
